page.title: 17Employment.Travel to work
page.content: Many men in Chepstow have different jobs and work in different areas and the travel costs are different. Mr. Gordon works at Computer World in Bristol.He is the Technical Support Manager for the South of England. Mr. Gordon has a company car.He sometimes has to go to exhibitions.He has to go 18miles to work and it costs Â£12 per week. Mr. Antony works as an optometrist in Cheltenham.It costs him around Â£40 a week on peterol.He travels 96miles there and back and it takes 50mins. to get there.He works for 10hours.He usually gets held up on the Severn Bridge due to repairs.He gets home around 19:00 to 22:00.Lastly we have Mr. Rush working for IBM. in Basingstoke which is 90miles away.He travels by car.Accidents,roadworks & the Severn Bridge are the difficulties he encounters daily.
